kpi.name: M1034C18

kpi_info.title: RAB ACCESS COMPLETIONS FOR PS NRT PER OPER
kpi_info.use: "The number of completed RAB access phases for PS data interactive and background.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE to the CN after successful RAB establishment for PS data interactive or background. In case of incoming hard handover or relocation the trigger is RANAP: RELOCATION COMPLETE."

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB ACCESS COMPLETIONS FOR PS NRT PER OPER
